property.name: entryDistributionValidationErrors
property.description: Comma seperated validation error types

property.name: id
property.description: Auto generated unique id

property.name: createdAt
property.description: Profile creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: updatedAt
property.description: Profile last update date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: autoCreateFlavors
property.description: Comma separated flavor params ids that should be auto converted

property.name: autoCreateThumb
property.description: Comma separated thumbnail params ids that should be auto generated

property.name: optionalFlavorParamsIds
property.description: Comma separated flavor params ids that should be submitted if ready

property.name: requiredFlavorParamsIds
property.description: Comma separated flavor params ids that required to be readt before submission

property.name: optionalThumbDimensions
property.description: Thumbnail dimensions that should be submitted if ready

property.name: requiredThumbDimensions
property.description: Thumbnail dimensions that required to be readt before submission

property.name: sunriseDefaultOffset
property.description: If entry distribution sunrise not specified that will be the default since entry creation time, in seconds

property.name: sunsetDefaultOffset
property.description: If entry distribution sunset not specified that will be the default since entry creation time, in seconds

property.name: id
property.description: The id of the Access Control Profile

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the Access Control Profile

property.name: description
property.description: The description of the Access Control Profile

property.name: createdAt
property.description: Creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: isDefault
property.description: True if this Conversion Profile is the default

property.name: restrictions
property.description: Array of Access Control Restrictions

property.name: pageSize
property.description: The number of objects to retrieve. (Default is 30, maximum page size is 500).

property.name: pageIndex
property.description: The page number for which {pageSize} of objects should be retrieved (Default is 1).

property.name: adminTags
property.description: Admin tags can be updated only by using an admin session

property.name: createdAt
property.description: Creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: updatedAt
property.description: Last update date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: partnerData
property.description: Can be used to store various partner related data as a string

property.name: id
property.description: Auto generated 10 characters alphanumeric string

property.name: name
property.description: Entry name (Min 1 chars)

property.name: description
property.description: Entry description

property.name: userId
property.description: The ID of the user who is the owner of this entry

property.name: tags
property.description: Entry tags

property.name: adminTags
property.description: Entry admin tags can be updated only by administrators

property.name: moderationStatus
property.description: Entry moderation status

property.name: moderationCount
property.description: Number of moderation requests waiting for this entry

property.name: type
property.description: The type of the entry, this is auto filled by the derived entry object

property.name: createdAt
property.description: Entry creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: updatedAt
property.description: Entry update date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: rank
property.description: Calculated rank

property.name: totalRank
property.description: The total (sum) of all votes

property.name: votes
property.description: Number of votes

property.name: partnerData
property.description: Can be used to store various partner related data as a string

property.name: downloadUrl
property.description: Download URL for the entry

property.name: searchText
property.description: Indexed search text for full text search

property.name: licenseType
property.description: License type used for this entry

property.name: version
property.description: Version of the entry data

property.name: thumbnailUrl
property.description: Thumbnail URL

property.name: accessControlId
property.description: The Access Control ID assigned to this entry (null when not set, send -1 to remove)

property.name: startDate
property.description: Entry scheduling start date (null when not set, send -1 to remove)

property.name: endDate
property.description: Entry scheduling end date (null when not set, send -1 to remove)

property.name: idEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only a specific entry (identified by its entryId). @var string

property.name: idIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving few specific entries (string should include comma separated list of entryId strings). @var string

property.name: nameLike
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It should include only one string to search for in entry names (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: nameMultiLikeOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry names, while applying an OR logic to retrieve entries that contain at least one input string (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: nameMultiLikeAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry names, while applying an AND logic to retrieve entries that contain all input strings (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: nameEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving entries with a specific name. @var string

property.name: partnerIdEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries which were uploaded by/assigned to users of a specific Kaltura Partner (identified by Partner ID). @var int

property.name: partnerIdIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries within Kaltura network which were uploaded by/assigned to users of few Kaltura Partners (string should include comma separated list of PartnerIDs) @var string

property.name: userIdEqual
property.description: This filter parameter should be in use for retrieving only entries, uploaded by/assigned to a specific user (identified by user Id). @var string

property.name: tagsLike
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It should include only one string to search for in entry tags (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: tagsMultiLikeOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry tags, while applying an OR logic to retrieve entries that contain at least one input string (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: tagsMultiLikeAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry tags, while applying an AND logic to retrieve entries that contain all input strings (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: adminTagsLike
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It should include only one string to search for in entry tags set by an ADMIN user (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: adminTagsMultiLikeOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry tags, set by an ADMIN user, while applying an OR logic to retrieve entries that contain at least one input string (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: adminTagsMultiLikeAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry tags, set by an ADMIN user, while applying an AND logic to retrieve entries that contain all input strings (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: statusEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries, at a specific {@link ?object=KalturaEntryStatus KalturaEntryStatus}. @var KalturaEntryStatus

property.name: statusNotEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries, not at a specific {@link ?object=KalturaEntryStatus KalturaEntryStatus}. @var KalturaEntryStatus

property.name: statusIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries, at few specific {@link ?object=KalturaEntryStatus KalturaEntryStatus} (comma separated). @dynamicType KalturaEntryStatus

property.name: statusNotIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries, not at few specific {@link ?object=KalturaEntryStatus KalturaEntryStatus} (comma separated). @dynamicType KalturaEntryStatus

property.name: typeIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving entries of few {@link ?object=KalturaEntryType KalturaEntryType} (string should include a comma separated list of {@link ?object=KalturaEntryType KalturaEntryType} enumerated parameters). @dynamicType KalturaEntryType

property.name: createdAtGreaterThanOrEqual
property.description: This filter parameter should be in use for retrieving only entries which were created at Kaltura system after a specific time/date (standard timestamp format). @var int

property.name: createdAtLessThanOrEqual
property.description: This filter parameter should be in use for retrieving only entries which were created at Kaltura system before a specific time/date (standard timestamp format). @var int

property.name: searchTextMatchAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries while search match the input string within all of the following metadata attributes: name, description, tags, adminTags. @var string

property.name: searchTextMatchOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries while search match the input string within at least one of the following metadata attributes: name, description, tags, adminTags. @var string

property.name: id
property.description: Moderation flag id

property.name: userId
property.description: The user id that added the moderation flag

property.name: moderationObjectType
property.description: The type of the moderation flag (entry or user)

property.name: flaggedEntryId
property.description: If moderation flag is set for entry, this is the flagged entry id

property.name: flaggedUserId
property.description: If moderation flag is set for user, this is the flagged user id

property.name: status
property.description: The moderation flag status

property.name: comments
property.description: The comment that was added to the flag

property.name: id
property.description: The id of the result

property.name: bulkUploadJobId
property.description: The id of the parent job

property.name: lineIndex
property.description: The index of the line in the CSV

property.name: rowData
property.description: The data as recieved in the csv

property.name: id

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the Category. The following characters are not allowed: '<', '>', ','

property.name: fullName
property.description: The full name of the Category

property.name: entriesCount
property.description: Number of entries in this Category (including child categories)

property.name: createdAt
property.description: Creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: left
property.description: Crop left point

property.name: top
property.description: Crop top point

property.name: width
property.description: Crop width

property.name: height
property.description: Crop height

property.description: indicator whether to return the object for get action with the dataContent field.

property.name: value

property.name: mediaType

property.name: conversionQuality

property.name: sourceType

property.name: searchProviderType

property.name: creditUserName

property.name: creditUrl

property.name: mediaDate

property.name: dataUrl
property.description: The URL used for playback. This is not the download URL.

property.name: flavorParamsIds
property.description: Comma separated flavor params ids that exists for this media entry

property.name: height

property.name: isSystemDefault

property.name: tags

property.name: height

property.name: frameRate

property.name: gopSize
property.description: The gop size of the Flavor Params

property.name: conversionEngines

property.description: The list of conversion engines extra params (separated with "|")

property.name: flavorAsset
property.description: The Flavor Asset (Can be null when there are params without asset)

property.name: flavorParams
property.description: The Flavor Params

property.name: entryId
property.description: The entry id

property.name: offlineMessage
property.description: The message to be presented when the stream is offline

property.name: streamRemoteId

property.name: streamRemoteBackupId

property.name: bitrates

property.name: encodingIP2
property.description: The broadcast secondary ip

property.name: streamPassword

property.name: streamUsername

property.name: extraData
property.description: Use this field to pass dynamic data for searching For example - if you set this field to "mymovies_$partner_id" The $partner_id will be automatically replcaed with your real partner Id

property.name: hasRealThumbnail
property.description: Indicates whether the user has submited a real thumbnail to the mix (Not the one that was generated automaticaly)

property.name: editorType
property.description: The editor type used to edit the metadata

property.name: dataContent
property.description: The xml data of the mix

property.name: url
property.description: The URL where the notification should be sent to

property.name: data
property.description: The serialized notification data to send

property.name: playlistContent
property.description: Content of the playlist - XML if the playlistType is dynamic text if the playlistType is static url if the playlistType is mRss

property.name: playlistType
property.description: Type of playlist

property.name: plays
property.description: Number of plays

property.name: views
property.description: Number of views

property.name: duration
property.description: The duration in seconds

property.name: timeZoneOffset
property.description: time zone offset in minutes

property.name: authData
property.description: The authentication data that further should be used for search

property.name: loginUrl
property.description: Login URL when user need to sign-in and authorize the search

property.name: message
property.description: Information when there was an error

property.name: eventTimestamp
property.description: the client's timestamp of this event

property.name: sessionId
property.description: a unique string generated by the client that will represent the client-side session: the primary component will pass it on to other components that sprout from it

property.name: uniqueViewer
property.description: the UV cookie - creates in the operational system and should be passed on ofr every event

property.name: userId
property.description: the partner's user id

property.name: currentPoint
property.description: the timestamp along the video when the event happend

property.name: duration
property.description: the duration of the video in milliseconds - will make it much faster than quering the db for each entry

property.name: userIp
property.description: will be retrieved from the request of the user

property.name: processDuration
property.description: the time in milliseconds the event took

property.name: controlId
property.description: the id of the GUI control - will be used in the future to better understand what the user clicked

property.name: seek
property.description: true if the user ever used seek in this session

property.name: newPoint
property.description: timestamp of the new point on the timeline of the video after the user seeks

property.name: referrer
property.description: the referrer of the client

property.name: isFirstInSession
property.description: will indicate if the event is thrown for the first video in the session

property.name: eventTimestamp
property.description: the client's timestamp of this event

property.name: sessionId
property.description: a unique string generated by the client that will represent the client-side session: the primary component will pass it on to other components that sprout from it

property.name: userId
property.description: the partner's user id

property.name: userIp
property.description: will be retrieved from the request of the user

property.name: playlistId
property.description: link a playlist that will set what content the feed will include if empty, all content will be included in feed

property.name: name
property.description: feed name

property.name: status
property.description: feed status

property.name: type
property.description: feed type

property.name: landingPage
property.description: Base URL for each video, on the partners site This is required by all syndication types.

property.name: createdAt
property.description: Creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: allowEmbed
property.description: allow_embed tells google OR yahoo weather to allow embedding the video on google OR yahoo video results or just to provide a link to the landing page. it is applied on the video-player_loc property in the XML (google) and addes media-player tag (yahoo)

property.name: playerUiconfId
property.description: Select a uiconf ID as player skin to include in the kwidget url

property.name: totalEntryCount
property.description: the total count of entries that should appear in the feed without flavor filtering

property.name: actualEntryCount
property.description: count of entries that will appear in the feed (including all relevant filters)

property.name: requireTranscodingCount
property.description: count of entries that requires transcoding in order to be included in feed

property.description: podcast thumbnail

property.name: feedDescription
property.description: feed description

property.name: feedLandingPage
property.description: feed landing page (i.e publisher website)

action.name: add
action.description: Add new Access Control Profile

action.name: get
action.description: Get Access Control Profile by id

action.name: update
action.description: Update Access Control Profile by id

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete Access Control Profile by id

action.name: list
action.description: List Access Control Profiles by filter and pager

service.name: adminUser
service.description: Manage details for the administrative user

action.name: updatePassword
action.description: Update admin user password and email

param.name: newEmail
param.description: Optional, provide only when you want to update the email

action.name: resetPassword
action.description: Reset admin user password and send it to the users email address

action.name: login
action.description: Get an admin session using admin email and password (Used for login to the KMC application)

action.name: setInitialPassword
action.description: Set initial users password

action.name: addFromUploadedFile
action.description: Generic add entry using an uploaded file, should be used when the uploaded entry type is not known

action.name: get
action.description: Get base entry by ID.

action.name: update
action.description: Update base entry. Only the properties that were set will be updated.

action.name: getByIds
action.description: Get base entry by comma separated entry ids.

param.name: entryIds
param.description: Comma separated string of entry ids

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete an entry.

action.name: list
action.description: List base entries by filter with paging support.

action.name: count
action.description: Count base entries by filter.

action.name: upload
action.description: Upload a file to Kaltura, that can be used to create an entry.

action.name: updateThumbnailJpeg
action.description: Update entry thumbnail using a raw jpeg file

action.name: updateThumbnailFromUrl
action.description: Update entry thumbnail using url

action.name: updateThumbnailFromSourceEntry
action.description: Update entry thumbnail from a different entry by a specified time offset (In seconds)

action.name: flag
action.description: Flag inappropriate entry for moderation

action.name: reject
action.description: Reject the entry and mark the pending flags (if any) as moderated (this will make the entry non playable)

action.name: approve
action.description: Approve the entry and mark the pending flags (if any) as moderated (this will make the entry playable)

action.name: listFlags
action.description: List all pending flags for the entry

action.name: anonymousRank
action.description: Anonymously rank an entry, no validation is done on duplicate rankings

service.name: bulkUpload
service.description: Bulk upload service is used to upload & manage bulk uploads using CSV files

action.name: add
action.description: Add new bulk upload batch job Conversion profile id can be specified in the API or in the CSV file, the one in the CSV file will be stronger. If no conversion profile was specified, partner's default will be used

param.name: conversionProfileId
param.description: Convertion profile id to use for converting the current bulk (-1 to use partner's default)

action.name: get
action.description: Get bulk upload batch job by id

action.name: list

service.name: media
service.description: Media service lets you upload and manage media files (images / videos & audio)

action.name: addFromUrl
action.description: Adds new media entry by importing an HTTP or FTP URL. The entry will be queued for import and then for conversion.

action.name: addFromSearchResult
action.description: Adds new media entry by importing the media file from a search provider. This action should be used with the search service result.

action.name: addFromUploadedFile
action.description: Add new entry after the specific media file was uploaded and the upload token id exists

action.name: addFromRecordedWebcam
action.description: Add new entry after the file was recored on the server and the token id exists

param.name: webcamTokenId
param.description: Token id for the recored webcam file

action.name: addFromEntry
action.description: Copy entry into new entry

param.name: sourceEntryId
param.description: Media entry id to copy from

param.name: sourceFlavorParamsId
param.description: The flavor to be used as the new entry source, source flavor will be used if not specified

action.name: addFromFlavorAsset
action.description: Copy flavor asset into new entry

param.name: sourceFlavorAssetId
param.description: Flavor asset id to be used as the new entry source

action.name: convert
action.description: Convert entry

action.name: get
action.description: Get media entry by ID.

action.name: update
action.description: Update media entry. Only the properties that were set will be updated.

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete a media entry.

action.name: list
action.description: List media entries by filter with paging support.

action.name: count
action.description: Count media entries by filter.

action.name: upload
action.description: Upload a media file to Kaltura, then the file can be used to create a media entry.

action.name: requestConversion
action.description: Request a new conversion job, this can be used to convert the media entry to a different format

action.name: flag
action.description: Flag inappropriate media entry for moderation

action.name: reject
action.description: Reject the media entry and mark the pending flags (if any) as moderated (this will make the entry non playable)

action.name: approve
action.description: Approve the media entry and mark the pending flags (if any) as moderated (this will make the entry playable)

action.name: listFlags
action.description: List all pending flags for the media entry

action.name: anonymousRank
action.description: Anonymously rank a media entry, no validation is done on duplicate rankings

service.name: mixing
service.description: A Mix is an XML unique format invented by Kaltura, it allows the user to create a mix of videos and images, in and out points, transitions, text overlays, soundtrack, effects and much more... Mixing service lets you create a new mix, manage its metadata and make basic manipulations.

action.name: add
action.description: Adds a new mix. If the dataContent is null, a default timeline will be created.

action.name: get
action.description: Get mix entry by id.

action.name: update
action.description: Update mix entry. Only the properties that were set will be updated.

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete a mix entry.

action.name: list
action.description: List entries by filter with paging support. Return parameter is an array of mix entries.

action.name: count
action.description: Count mix entries by filter.

action.name: clone
action.description: Clones an existing mix.

action.name: appendMediaEntry
action.description: Appends a media entry to a the end of the mix timeline, this will save the mix timeline as a new version.

param.name: mixEntryId
param.description: Mix entry to append to its timeline

param.name: mediaEntryId
param.description: Media entry to append to the timeline

action.name: requestFlattening
action.description: Request a new flattening job, flattening is used to convert a video mix to a video file.

param.name: version
param.description: Version to flatten (If not set, latest will be used)

action.name: getMixesByMediaId
action.description: Get the mixes in which the media entry is included

action.name: getReadyMediaEntries
action.description: Get all ready media entries that exist in the given mix id

param.name: version
param.description: Desired version to get the data from

action.name: anonymousRank
action.description: Anonymously rank a mix entry, no validation is done on duplicate rankings

action.name: getClientNotification
action.description: Return the notifications for a specific entry id and type

service.name: partner
service.description: partner service allows you to change/manage your partner personal details and settings as well

action.name: register
action.description: Register to Kaltura's partner program

action.name: update
action.description: Update details and settings of you existing partner

action.name: getSecrets
action.description: Retrieve partner secret and admin secret

action.name: getInfo
action.description: Retrieve all info about partner This service gets no parameters, and is using the KS to know which partnerId info should be returned

action.name: getUsage
action.description: Get usage statistics for a partner Calculation is done according to partner's package Additional data returned is a graph points of streaming usage in a timeframe The resolution can be "days" or "months"

action.description: Retrieve a KalturaPermission object by ID

action.name: delete

service.name: playlist
service.description: Playlist service lets you create,manage and play your playlists Playlists could be static (containing a fixed list of entries) or dynamic (baseed on a filter)

action.name: add
action.description: Add new playlist Note that all entries used in a playlist will become public and may appear in KalturaNetwork

action.name: get
action.description: Retrieve a playlist

action.name: update
action.description: Update existing playlist Note - you cannot change playlist type. updated playlist must be of the same type.

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete existing playlist

action.name: clone
action.description: Clone an existing playlist

param.name: id
param.description: Id of the playlist to clone

param.name: newPlaylist
param.description: Parameters defined here will override the ones in the cloned playlist

action.name: list
action.description: List available playlists

action.name: execute
action.description: Retrieve playlist for playing purpose

action.name: executeFromContent
action.description: Retrieve playlist for playing purpose, based on content

action.name: executeFromFilters
action.description: Revrieve playlist for playing purpose, based on media entry filters

action.name: getStatsFromContent
action.description: Retrieve playlist statistics

service.name: report
service.description: api for getting reports data by the report type and some inputFilter

action.name: getGraphs
action.description: report getGraphs action allows to get a graph data for a specific report.

param.name: objectIds
param.description: - one ID or more (separated by ',') of specific objects to query

action.name: getTotal
action.description: report getTotal action allows to get a graph data for a specific report.

param.name: objectIds
param.description: - one ID or more (separated by ',') of specific objects to query

action.name: getTable
action.description: report getTable action allows to get a graph data for a specific report.

param.name: objectIds
param.description: - one ID or more (separated by ',') of specific objects to query

action.name: getUrlForReportAsCsv
action.description: will create a Csv file for the given report and return the URL to access it

param.name: reportTitle
param.description: The title of the report to display at top of CSV

param.name: reportText
param.description: The text of the filter of the report

param.name: headers
param.description: The headers of the columns - a map between the enumerations on the server side and the their display text

param.name: objectIds
param.description: - one ID or more (separated by ',') of specific objects to query

service.name: search
service.description: Search service allows you to search for media in various media providers This service is being used mostly by the CW component

action.name: search
action.description: Search for media in one of the supported media providers

param.name: search
param.description: A KalturaSearch object contains the search keywords, media provider and media type

action.name: getMediaInfo
action.description: Retrieve extra information about media found in search action Some providers return only part of the fields needed to create entry from, use this action to get the rest of the fields.

param.name: searchResult
param.description: KalturaSearchResult object extends KalturaSearch and has all fields required for media:add

action.name: searchUrl
action.description: Search for media given a specific URL Kaltura supports a searchURL action on some of the media providers. This action will return a KalturaSearchResult object based on a given URL (assuming the media provider is supported)

action.name: start
action.description: Start a session with Kaltura's server. The result KS is the session key that you should pass to all services that requires a ticket.

param.name: secret
param.description: Remember to provide the correct secret according to the sessionType you want

action.name: end
action.description: End a session with the Kaltura server, making the current KS invalid.

action.name: impersonate
action.description: Start an impersonated session with Kaltura's server. The result KS is the session key that you should pass to all services that requires a ticket.

param.name: secret
param.description: Remember to provide the correct secret according to the sessionType you want

action.name: startWidgetSession
action.description: Start a session for Kaltura's flash widgets

action.name: collect
action.description: Will write to the event log a single line representing the event KalturaStatsEvent $event

action.name: kmcCollect
action.description: Will collect the kmcEvent sent form the KMC client

action.description: Add new Syndication Feed

action.name: setAsDefault

param.name: destThumbParamsId

service.name: user
service.description: Manage partner users on Kaltura's side The userId in kaltura is the unique Id in the partner's system, and the [partnerId,Id] couple are unique key in kaltura's DB

action.name: add
action.description: Adds a user to the Kaltura DB. Input param $id is the unique identifier in the partner's system

action.name: update
action.description: Update existing user, it is possible to update the user id too

action.name: get
action.description: Get user by user ID

action.name: getByLoginId
action.description: Get user by user's login ID and partner ID

action.name: delete
action.description: Mark the user as deleted

action.name: list
action.description: List users (When not set in the filter, blocked and deleted users will be returned too)

action.name: notifyBan
action.description: Notify about user ban

action.name: login
action.description: Get a session using user id and password

action.name: loginByLoginId
action.description: Get a session using user's kaltura id and password

action.name: updateLoginData
action.description: Update user password and email

param.name: newLoginId
param.description: Optional, provide only when you want to update the login id

action.name: resetPassword
action.description: Reset admin user password and send it to the users email address

action.name: setInitialPassword
action.description: Set initial users password

action.name: enableLogin
action.description: Enable the user to login with a loginId (email) and password.

action.name: disableLogin
action.description: Disallow user to login with an id/password. Passing either a loginId or a userId is allowed.

service.name: xInternal
service.description: Internal Service is used for actions that are used internally in Kaltura applications and might be changed in the future without any notice.

action.name: xAddBulkDownload
action.description: Creates new download job for multiple entry ids (comma separated), an email will be sent when the job is done This sevice support the following entries: - MediaEntry - Video will be converted using the flavor params id - Audio will be downloaded as MP3 - Image will be downloaded as Jpeg - MixEntry will be flattend using the flavor params id - Other entry types are not supported Returns the admin email that the email message will be sent to

param.name: entryIds
param.description: Comma separated list of entry ids

action.name: list

action.description: Allows you to add a metadata xml data from remote URL. Enables different permissions than addFromUrl action.
